TextBlock.Text: DAUCUS: Interesting. This rock provides a convenient form of travel, even to areas that are otherwise closed off entirely.
ADONSONIA: Exactly! Supposedly this is due to the fact that the rock has a chance to appear in each location.

ALNUS: The mention of chance reminds me, I thought of another requirement for our project. I believe that the large planet should not be placed in the farthest orbit, since mass in a star system should tend towards the center.
BETULA: That is a fair idea! I'll inform Oryza that we will avoid placing the largest planet in the farthest orbit.
